note:
I'm Ian, I like gravy, and I like custard. Edinburgh-centred quizzer and korfballer, also known to go on about rugby league. I appreciate silliness. Views probably someone else's.

I'm interested in a wide range of things, and people; mostly how they think and operate. While I'm not especially odd in my own thinking, though I do exhibit some tendencies toward statistics, systems and logic, irascibility at changes of plan, contrariness, and biscuits.

My self-esteem always appreciates a boost.
